abstract: The fraud cases against Goldman Sachs and Citigroup may have been identical, but Citigroup paid a smaller settlement and doesn’t face the same degree of outrage.
snippet: The fraud cases against Goldman Sachs and Citigroup may have been identical, but Citigroup paid a smaller settlement and doesn’t face the same degree of outrage.

headline.main: The Late-Mover Advantage in Citigroup's Settlement
